page.title: 13MY FIRST YEAR AT HATHERSHAW
page.content: When I first came to Hathershaw,I felt very scared because it seemed so big, and all the people were new. The subjects are interesting,but there are some I dont like,metalwork, woodwork and science are boring. My personal favourites are french and maths. At christmas we had a party for all the first years,it was brilliant. We had old time dancing like the barn dance and others,we also had modern disco dancing.Half way through the party you could hand in your ticket and get a packet of crisps and a drink. Over a period of months our school helped to raise money for Ethiopia,we sent them some blankets and woollen tops,and we have also raised over Â£100 for them.
